item.title: AI in Dermatology: Revolutionizing Skincare
item.description: In recent years, artificial intelligence (AI) has made significant strides in various fields, including healthcare. One of the most exciting applications of AI is in dermatology, where it is revolutionizing skincare and improving patient outcomes.
